name: Dinari SPSK
description: The Dinari SPSK dShares token (SPSK.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in the SP Funds Dow Jones Global Sukuk ETF (NYSE Arca: SPSK), an exchange-traded fund designed to provide exposure to global sukuk (Shariah-compliant bonds), which adhere to Islamic finance principles. Sukuk are structured to generate returns to investors without involving interest payments, instead relying on asset-backed financing and profit-sharing mechanisms. Each SPSK.d token is fully backed by a corresponding SPSK ETF share, securely held in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, SPSK.d provides investors with access to a diversified portfolio of Shariah-compliant fixed-income securities, while benefiting from 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity.
